column5: Some of you may have seen these before but this was the coolest thing I have seen in a while.   The tracks Hydraulically drop when you park it at the fishing hole. Floats too.
That is sharp  - any idea on the cost and what they weigh?   Don

Two real good questions and I'm not sure of either one of them.    I just posted it for interests sake. I will find out tomorrow if you like. It moves along very well and steers easily. A small 4 cylinder gas engine and a heater. rides pretty good too. I wonder if I can talk my brother into a test drive on Nipissing?
Ya Muskie..they do..Maybe I should have tried it today.
WOW !!!  That thing looks awesome.  Beds too. I could get used to riding and fishing in that thing. The ultimate portable ice hut.

Don't quote me, but I think I saw a $20K sticker mentioned somewhere last year, don't know if it was Cdn or US.  Considering it more or less covers ice hut and transportation, if a guy was to buy one and keep it for 20 years then the price wouldn't be too bad.

Wow .. looks too cool ... but .. just ot play devils advocate ... because we all wanna toss $20K into our next hut  ... by my figuring it would be about a three foot haul from ice level into the vehicle ... need a real long gaff  :) :0
Here a video of it  high bandwidth  http://www.snow-bear.com/images/video/snobear2big.wmv  low bandwidth  http://www.snow-bear.com/images/video/snobear2small.wmv
